title: Tales Of The Texas Rangers and This Is Your FBI

content:encoded:
Case Closed opens with a story from Tales Of The Texas Rangers this week. We hear Blood Justice, their story from March 11, 1951.

(30:07) This Is Your FBI closes this week’s episode with their story from April 26, 1946, Salesman Of Espionage.

Download CaseClosed788

Visit donate.relicradio.com for more information on how you can support Case Closed. Your help keeps this show coming every week! Thank you.
